[vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Achievements” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:left|color:%23404244″ google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”ENOC Certificate of Recognition” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:16px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:18px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_single_image image=”1455″ img_size=”medium” onclick=”link_image”][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Over 1,000 cases annually with a success rate of approximately 90% representing the accused and/or the accuser.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Public indecency
Setting a precedent by acquitting a couple accused of public indecency in their car. Numerous other successful cases by acquitting clients against charges of public indecency.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Premeditated murder
Reducing R.R’s sentence from execution to ten years imprisonment on account of lack of evidence.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Human Trafficking
First human trafficking case to be presented at the Dubai Criminal Courts where the accused T.P was acquitted from all charges due to a lack of evidence and intentions for the alleged trafficking.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Cheque Cases (Criminal & Civil)
Over 600 cases with an approximate total recovery of over AED 750 million.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Crimes relating to Illicit substances
Over 100 cases in acquitting numerous transit passengers and residents accused of consuming illicit substances. Numerous successful cases where the Defendant is acquitted from his/her charges based on the lack of investigational procedures by the authorities. Reducing M.A’s sentence from execution to life imprisonment despite allegations of his truck being packed with illicit substances.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][vc_empty_space height=”65px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Civil Cases” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:32px|text_align:left|color:%23404244″ google_fonts=”font_family:Playfair%20Display%3Aregular%2Citalic%2C700%2C700italic%2C900%2C900italic|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Property Cases
Representatives for over 300 cases annually with a total recovered value of approximately AED 500 Million. Setting a precedent by being the first law firm to receive a favourable judgment for repudiation of the Sales & Purchase Agreements for properties against the major developers based on Article (3) of Law 13 2008 regarding the interim registration of the property contracts.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][vc_column_text]Read more[/vc_column_text][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Compensation claims
Representatives for over 500 cases with a total recovery value of approximately AED 250 Million. AED 1 Million per case was recovered for numerous cases.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][vc_column_text]Read more[/vc_column_text][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Insurance
Representatives for over 500 insurance cases with over AED 500 Million recovered.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][vc_column_text]Read more[/vc_column_text][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Banking
Over AED 1 Billion recovered on behalf of the banks represented.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][vc_column_text]Read more[/vc_column_text][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Corporate Law
Representatives for some of the largest and most reputable companies in the United Arab Emirates.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][vc_column_text]Read more[/vc_column_text][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Arbitration
Distinguished members at the Dubai International Arbitration Centre. Acting as Arbitrators and counsel representation for over 100 cases in Arabic and English.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][vc_column_text]Read more[/vc_column_text][cms_fancybox icon1=”fa fa-arrow-right” cms_line_bottom=”1″ description1=”Shariah Law
Representatives for over 100 cases, which include successful issuing of the shariah, decree for the lawful heirs and numerous favourable judgment in custody battles.” cms_template=”cms_fancybox–layout2.php”][vc_column_text]Read more[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1513588545920{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 54px !important;background-color: #e7e8e9 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1519141110791{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Fax: (+971) 4 453 9191
Flat 2&3 Fourth Floor, Builing 3, The Gate District, P.O.Box 4866, Dubai - U.A.E.
